availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel C. Campbell (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa C. Howard Campbell in Christian County, Kentucky, on March 11, 1847. Father of Samuel F. Campbell, James M. Campbell, America Campbell, William Campbell, and Martha Campbell. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 361B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 35.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 137A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #001942963, p. 119.
Illinois, U.S., Wills and Probate Records, 1772-1999, Macon County, Estate Files, Case No. 838-847, p. 97-193 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com on March 17, 2021).
